text: My dog, a 13 year old Shih Tzu, is a VERY picky eater - like many dogs, he will (eventually) eat what is put in front of him, but over the years I've gone through numerous types of food only to have him sit next to his bowl and look at me as if to say "what?  You want me to eat THAT?".  When I offered him Beneful for the first time, he sniffed it, and promptly started eating.  It was nice to see him accept a new type of food so quickly, and I know that he will be eating this for the rest of his days, and any other dogs that I may adopt at some point in the future will also eat Beneful.
